name: Avoid unreferenced Logical file  (DDS400)
description: This rule searches for all the unreferenced logical  files.
output:
This report lists DDS400 unreferenced logical File.
It provides the following information:
DDS400 Logical File full name
rationale:
Unreferenced Logical files may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.

Warning:
Unreferenced code can also be the symptoms of missing code
remediation: Check if the unreferenced Logical files is not the symptome of missing code and if it is not the case, remove them.
remediationSample:
Reduce number of unreferenced logical files. Logical file are referred in RPG programs in following way

FMYFILE IF E DISK INFDS(FILEFBK)
total: Total number of DDS400 Logical File

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid inactive code blocks that can mistakenly be considered as active and that can hide the active code in noise

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of reuse requires more maintenance effort in order to propagate changes to all instances of duplicated code

Measure Element
Number of instances where a named callable control element or method control element is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a callable or method control element)
